mapper.select: SELECT t.ticketname ticketname,t.ticketprice ticketprice ,t.ticketall ticketall,t.ticketremain ticketremain ,t.ticketid ticketid, m.homeclub homeclub,m.awayclub awayclub,m.matchid matchid ,m.matchdate matchdate , m.matchtime matchtime,t.ticketid ticketid FROM `match` m LEFT OUTER JOIN ticket t ON m.matchid = t.matchid ORDER BY t.ticketid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `match` (homeclub, awayclub, matchdate, matchtime) VALUES (#{homeclub}, #{awayclub}, #{matchdate}, #{matchtime})
INSERT INTO `ticket` (ticketname, ticketprice, ticketall, ticketremain,matchid) VALUES (#{ticketname}, #{ticketprice}, #{ticketall}, #{ticketremain},#{matchid})
mapper.select: SELECT t.ticketname ticketname, t.ticketprice ticketprice ,t.ticketall ticketall, t.ticketremain ticketremain ,t.ticketid ticketid, m.homeclub homeclub, m.awayclub awayclub, m.matchid matchid ,m.matchdate matchdate, m.matchtime matchtime FROM `match` m LEFT OUTER JOIN ticket t ON m.matchid = t.matchid WHERE t.ticketid = #{ticketid} or m.matchid = #{matchid}

SELECT *, clubimgsize as clubimgsize, clubimgfilefull as clubimgfilefull, clubimgfile as clubimgfile ,stadiumimgfile as stadiumimgfile ,stadiumimgfilefull as stadiumimgfilefull ,stadiumimgsize as stadiumimgsize FROM `club` WHERE club = #{club}
SELECT c.club club ,t.ticketname ticketname ,t.ticketremain ticketremain FROM `club` c JOIN `match` m ON c.club = m.homeclub JOIN `ticket`t ON m.matchid = t.matchid
